actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide a minimum rate of interest which banks must pay on Christmas club accounts.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, a minimum rate of interest which banks must pay on Christmas club accounts equal to the rate paid on its savings deposits. (Amends 12 U.S.C. 371b, 1828(g))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act and the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to provide a minimum rate of interest which banks must pay on Christmas club accounts.
